text: Duval Mba Wapiwo (born 20 January 2000) is a Cameroonian football player who currently plays for Sporting Kansas City II on loan from MFK Vyškov. Wapiwo joined USL Championship side North Carolina FC on loan for their 2019 season. After playing two games with NCFC in the 2019 U.S. Open Cup, Wapiwo made his league debut in a game against Loudoun United FC on July 17, 2019. On January 7, 2020, he joined USL Championship side Sporting Kansas City II on loan. ==References== ==External links== * Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Cameroonian footballers Category:Cameroonian expatriate footballers Category:North Carolina FC players Category:Sporting Kansas City II players Category:Association football midfielders Category:USL Championship players
title: Duval Wapiwo
